title: Investors expecting an aggressive Fed cut are getting too 'ahead of the curve,' UBS CEO says
content: The markets may be getting too ahead of themselves that the U.S. Federal Reserve will pull an aggressive rate cut, said the CEO of Swiss banking giant UBS.
summary: The markets may be getting too ahead of themselves that the U.S. Federal Reserve will pull an aggressive rate cut, said the CEO of Swiss banking giant UBS.

title: Harris or Trump: Does it matter for China who wins the election?

title: Oprah and Diane von Furstenberg slam assault on women's reproductive rights

title: Bill Gates-backed startup says a global gold rush for buried hydrogen is picking up momentum
content: Geologic hydrogen — sometimes known as white, gold or natural hydrogen — refers to hydrogen gas that is found in its natural form beneath Earth's surface.

title: 'Economy class syndrome' is a medical issue that can happen on flights — no matter where you sit
content: Deep vein thrombosis can be a serious health issue that strikes at any time. But medium-to long-haul flights increase the risk of developing it.
summary: Deep vein thrombosis can be a serious health issue that strikes at any time. But medium-to long-haul flights increase the risk of developing it.

title: Bill Gates shares the single-minded attitude he used to grow Microsoft: I focused my life 'just on the one job'

title: Japanese wage growth to surpass inflation for the first time in over 30 years, says asset management firm
